These constructed warriors can work together as a trained group to repel intruders. **[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 31 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 [Terra-Cotta Garrison](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1333) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 263 **Perception** +22 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); (can't speak any language) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +26, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23 **Str** +7 **Dex** +2 **Con** +6 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +4 --- **AC** 27 (29 with shields raised) **Fort** +25 **Ref** +19 **Will** +20 **HP** 240 (16 squares) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [diseased](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Weaknesses** area damage 15, bludgeoning 10, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 8 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)**
**[Troop Defenses](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=44)** --- **Speed** 25 feet; troop movement **Aim as One** The troop launches a ranged attack in the form of a 10-foot burst within 100 feet that deals 3d8+11 damage (DC 25 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). When the garrison is reduced to 8 or fewer squares, this area decreases to a 5-foot burst. **[Form Up](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=43)** **Raise Shields** The troop raises steel shields, with the effects of [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98). **Strike as One** **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The garrison makes a melee attack against each enemy within 5 feet (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The damage depends on the number of actions.
2d8 slashing damage
3d8+10 slashing damage
4d8+13 slashing damage **Troop Movement** Whenever a troop Strides, it first [Forms Up](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=43) as a free action to condense into a 20-foot-by-20-foot area (minus any missing squares), then moves up to its Speed. This works just like a Gargantuan creature moving; for instance, if any square enters difficult terrain, the extra movement cost applies to the whole troop.
